timeline.message:
Update issue templates

Make boilerplate/suggestions into comments so they don't show up in final issue if people forget to edit them out.

Add default labels to identify issues needing triage.

timeline.bodyText: Is there any difference between triage needed and to be reviewed or should we merge these two tags?
timeline.author: wetneb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,9 @@
 ---
 name: Bug report
 about: Create a report to help us improve OpenRefine
+title: ''
+labels: bug, triage needed

replies.bodyText: Happy to use the historical to be reviewed. I just wasn't sure of the current semantics.
replies.author: tfmorris

replies.bodyText: Ok, that's pretty much how we have been using it so far, so let's do that.
replies.author: wetneb
